## RemoteRepository.create() method

Create repository on remote site

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
create(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

[UndefinedPersonalAccessTokenError](./git-documentdb.undefinedpersonalaccesstokenerror.md)

Following errors:

- The repository which has the same name exists.

- Authentication error

- Permission error

- Network error

## Remarks

auth.type must be 'github'
